roleset.name: procedure in which a nerve is cut

example.name: ARG2, implicit ARG1
example.text: Patient underwent bilateral L3 through L5 radiofrequency neurotomy last week .
example.amr: (n / neurotomy-01 :ARG1 (t / thing :location (a / anatomical-site :name (n2 / name :op1 "L") :mod (v / value-interval :op1 3 :op2 5)) :mod (b / bilateral)) :ARG2 (p / patient-yy) :instrument (r / radiofrequency) :time (w / week :mod (l / last)))

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: We will perform neurotomy of the musculocutaneous nerve for the treatment of elbow spasticity .
example.amr: (n / neurotomy-01 :ARG0 (w / we) :ARG1 (a / anatomical-site :name (n2 / name :op1 "musculocutaneous" :op2 "nerve")) :ARG3-of (t / treat-03 :ARG2 (s / spastic-01 :ARG1 (a2 / anatomical-site :name (n3 / name :op1 "elbow")))))
